uptimeStats.title: Uptime statistics
uptimeStats.description: Uptime is calculated across all our hosting infrastructure. Individual server performance may vary slightly. We report these numbers honestly—no creative accounting.

noIncidents.title: No recent incidents

commitment.title: Our commitment:
